name: Vegan Chocolate Chip, Oatmeal, and Nut Cookies
author: NashvilleVeggie
summary: Peanut butter and oatmeal cookie with chocolate chips.
ingredients: ½ cup vegan semi-sweet chocolate chips
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Stir sugar, soy milk, peanut butter, canola oil, and vanilla extract together with a whisk in a large bowl until completely smooth
Mix flour, oats, baking soda, and salt in a separate bowl; add to the peanut butter mixture and stir to combine
Fold chocolate chips and walnut pieces into the flour mixture
Drop your batter by large spoonfuls onto prepared baking sheet
Bake cookies in preheated oven until browned along the edges, about 10 minutes
Cool cookies on sheet for 10 minutes before removing to a cooling rack to cool completely
